snippet: Gun rights activists turned in petition signatures Monday to set up a recall of the State Senate president, John Morse, a Democrat, after he backed strict gun control measures.
abstract: Gun rights activists in Colorado turn in petition signatures to set up recall of State Senate president John Morse, a Democrat, after he backed strict gun control measures.
lead_paragraph: Gun rights activists turned in petition signatures Monday to set up a recall of the State Senate president, John Morse, a Democrat, after he backed strict gun control measures.

headline.main: Colorado: Petitions Submitted for Recall Vote
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Petitions Submitted For Recall Vote
